bug.short_desc: Offer more lang / util functions as module

long_desc.thetext:
Many useful methods are present in qxWebsite, but they are not directly reachable. I guess it would be an good enhancement to provide qxWebseite with all qx.lang. und may be other useful static functions.
At least all functions, they are available on q.$$qx should be rechable from q.

I guess my last sentence is misunderstand able. I meant to make all static functions reachable through qxWebsite, they are available under q.$$qx anyway, would be a solution.
But in case of documentation I guess its worth to iterate through some qx name spaces and decide if its worth to make its static functions public trough qxWebsite.
e.g. qx.lang.Object#mergeWith is a good candidate

+1 for "mergeWith"
These little helpers shouldn't have to be implemented by each application (developer).
Wiring these into the q API is very easy and we should add them step by step whenever they are needed.

More functions I'm missing:
qx.lang.String .format
qx.lang.Array .removeAt
qx.lang.Object .getLength .getKeyFromValue .empty .isEmpty
